reviews.title: Poor Service
reviews.text: The service and attitude of staff was deplorable. Food was great but some staff were obviously not into serving customers. One in particular was off with the fairies making mistakes which duly led to rudeness

reviews.title: Wow Great food and service
reviews.text: Came here exhausted after a day at Mansfield zoo. Staff could see that my kids were tired and went out of their way to see that they had their meals quickly. Great meals and big serves. Love being able to get vegies with kids meals.

reviews.title: Good pub meal
reviews.text: Kids on the table next to us had the kuds steak on hot stone. Great idea for older kids.

reviews.title: Good Pub Bistro
reviews.text: Unfortunately on other night we made the mistake of going to the Delatite Hotel. Rookie mistake. This was hands down the better pub for families.
We sat outside and enjoyed the sunshine. Meals were very nice but did take there time for fish and chips and salad, and not very many customers either. But a good pub meal.
reviews.title: Early Dinner with the Family.... they weren't ready for us...
Best Steak I have ever eaten
reviews.text: Been to this hotel for dinner twice now and both times one year apart and both times neer failed to please. Fantastic back garden area under the shady trees. Terrific on a hot night in Mansfield's summer. Well done.

reviews.title: Great Tucker
reviews.text: Good Menu selection. Meals were a good size and reasonably priced. Large Dining area with comfortable seating. Wine selection is small but good quality.

reviews.title: great food
reviews.text: service was awesome, food was awesome, great menu for adults and children. we will certainly go back there!!!

reviews.title: Great food, average service, good atmosphere!
reviews.text: The food was served within 20 min for our group of 10. The food was excellent and the portions generous. Great family restaurant.

This is a little find in a country town. You have to brave the bar to get through to the lovely and spacious bistro out the back, but go out to the courtyard - it is just lovely. Service is very good, food of a very high quality and prices are average / reasonable. A nice place to while away an evening.
reviews.title: Excellent Courtyard Dining.
Best steak experience
reviews.text: The stone cooking steak is impossible to beat. This experience is where the raw steak arrives in front of you on an extremely hot granite stone and you then slice it up and cook it on the stone in front of you. Just a great experience overall

reviews.title: Fantastic food and relaxing atmosphere :)
reviews.text: Food and atmosphere was FANTASTIC, but the service needs to be improved. Waitresses could do with some better training.

reviews.title: Good food
reviews.text: The food was nice. It was delivered promptly. The seating area was nice and there was a fire as well.

So we just recently came back from a day at the mountain and had some ripper cob loaf. It was a good environment too, the hot waitress was just letting the g-banger hang out, at lot of staring was had by all. We would go back for her xox
reviews.title: Good bread, good women

reviews.text: We ate here as a family of four and were blown away by the terrific food and service. The food was fantastic and reasonably priced, if we had of been in Mansfield another night we would have returned.
reviews.title: Fantastic
Pretty good food, poor service
reviews.text: I had dinner on a week night. It was prompt to be seated. Modern deco with a big fireplace that makes you feel comfy.

reviews.title: A hearty meal...
reviews.text: Food was pretty good but my companions and I waited for 40 minutes upon ordering for our meals. So we asked a waitress to check. She said it will be a few minutes away. As we waited for about one hour, we spoke to the supervisor / manager, she firstly walked off, then went back to the counter again and said "we are busy" without any indication of how much longer we needed to wait or apology.

reviews.title: Lovely meal
reviews.text: I think that you will agree that waiting for 1 hour for simple pasta dishes and pizzas is NOT acceptable. The pub across the road has better service and food is not bad.

reviews.title: Good food
reviews.text: I ate dinner here twice whilst in the area on a business trip. The Bistro area is large and I imagine during winter it gets quite busy but when I was there it was reasonably quiet. The menu caters for all tastes, has a good range of kids meals and it's own wood fired pizza oven. The servings are generous and the taste, whilst nothing to get too excited about, was palatable. A hearty country pub meal.

reviews.title: Mansfield Hotel
reviews.text: They organised a table for 12 with out any problems and not a complaint from any on the table as far as our meals went
